page.home.head.title: Next.js i18n example
page.home.title: Welcome to Next.js i18n tutorial
page.home.description: You are currently viewing the homepage in English 🚀
homepage.title: Welcome To Al-Manshah - The Academic Forum
homepage.description: "Almanshah' is the largest Arab academic forum that unites academics from the Arab population in a variety of fields based on the development of education in the Arab population while creating a partnership and exchanging knowledge and finding opportunities, as well as consolidating a vast knowledge base for academic activities. The next generation looks to Almanshah as a reference for a higher education.
homepage.ourUnique.title: ميزتنا

homepage.ourUnique.description: خبرتنا وقدرتنا على التسويق للوصول لجميع الاكاديميين وحثهم ليكونوا جزء من المنشاة المنتدى الاكاديمي .
القدرة العالية بالتواصل بين الناس وخلق القيمة المضافة لجميع الجهات.

homepage.wwh.title: why
homepage.wwh.description: A platform that brings together professional Arab academics in one place to facilitate communication between professionals and academics from different fields and to inspire the next generation to pursue academic careers.

sub_descriptions.description: An increase of 40% in Arab academics per academic year within three years.
Creating collaborations between academics and the economy
Academics' integration into the labor market
Access to all academic information for the Arab population in one place.
In four years, the project will be scaled up from a local project to a global project.
One of the world's most popular academic podcasts

homepage.wwh.title: how
homepage.wwh.description: The compilation of all academic information on one platform, including a database of Arab academics, news, events, academic project activities, academic institutions, and employers supporting the integration of Arab academics into the labor market

sub_descriptions.description: Companies that support the integration of Arab academics in their organizations, including job openings
Higher education institutions in Israel provide services to the Arab community.
A variety of scholarships are available for students.
Arab academic podcast "Make your voice heard"
Conferences and workshops in various fields to network among Arab academics and support the academy

homepage.wwh.title: what
homepage.wwh.description: Almanshah is the first platform to offer a comprehensive academic database and academic services for the Arab community

sub_descriptions.description: Among the Arab population, there are many challenges, including socioeconomic status gaps, educational gaps, and language barriers. Almanshah is based on the belief that academia and social involvement are essential for closing these gaps. It has been demonstrated in studies that academic social activity promotes positive thinking, which gives a sense of mental and general well-being, as well as reducing crime and violence

homepage.founders.title: تعرفوا علينا

homepage.founders.name: Hassan Hasona
homepage.founders.title: Co-Founder & Technology Manager
homepage.founders.desc: Hassan Hassona graduated from Tel Aviv-Yafo Academic College with a Bachelor of Science degree in cave management. Experienced in developing and setting up websites using the most advanced technologies in the market, both on the server side and on the client side .Extensive experience in management, planning, decision-making, and sales and marketing.

homepage.founders.name: ala Hasona
homepage.founders.title: Founder & Manager
homepage.founders.desc: Ala Hasona is a doctoral student at Bar-Ilan University, specializing in entrepreneurship with a bachelor's degree in economics A master's degree in business administration with a focus on marketing. With more than 12 years of experience in sales, planning and budgeting, knowledge of operations and business functions (finance, human resources, procurement), analytical abilities, excellent communication skills and exceptional organizational abilities, she has considerable expertise in the establishment of social-business ventures.
